ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: The authors thank all the medical healthcare specialists who treated patients during this ongoing pandemic situation across the Globe. Dr. H. C. Yashavantha Rao also acknowledges the award from the University Grants Commission, New Delhi, Government of India (DSKPDF Scheme‐No.F.4‐2/2006 (BSR)/BL/17‐18/0234).
